snp1.8:1.1: Those who are skilled in the meaning of scripture
snp1.8:1.2: should practice as follows <j>to realize the state of peace.
snp1.8:1.3: Let them be able and upright, very upright,
snp1.8:1.4: easy to speak to, gentle and humble;
snp1.8:3.1: Let them not do the slightest thing
snp1.8:3.2: that others might blame with reason.
snp1.8:3.3: May they be happy and safe!
snp1.8:4.2: with not a one left out—
snp1.8:4.3: frail or firm, long or large,
snp1.8:5.3: those who have been born <j>and those about to be born—
snp1.8:6.2: nor look down on anyone anywhere.
snp1.8:6.4: let them not wish pain on each other.
snp1.8:7.1: Even as a mother would protect with her life
snp1.8:8.1: With love for the whole world,
snp1.8:9.2: or lying down while yet unweary,
snp1.8:9.4: for this, they say, is a divine meditation <j>in this life.
snp1.8:10.4: they never return to a womb again.
